game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has no meaning, the fabric of reality is torn apart by a cataclysmic event known as "The Great Dissonance". The land is scarred, and the remnants of humanity are forced to live in a state of constant flux. Players take on the role of a Chronicler, tasked with unraveling the mysteries of the past and restoring balance to the timestream.
game.beginning: The game begins in the desolate wasteland of Cronos, where the player's character is awakened by an enigmatic figure known only as "The Architect". With no memory of their past, the Chronicler sets out on a perilous journey to explore the shattered remnants of civilization and uncover clues about their own identity.
game.ending: As the Chronicler delves deeper into the mysteries of the timestream, they discover that The Great Dissonance was not a random event, but rather a catastrophic consequence of humanity's meddling with the fabric of time. In the end, the player must make a choice: to restore balance to the timestream, or to succumb to the allure of power and reshape reality in their image.
